metric.name: Backups Completed
metric.description: The number of backups of this disk store that have been taking while this VM was alive

metric.name: Backups In Progress
metric.description: The current number of backups in progress on this disk store

metric.name: Compact Delete Time
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing deletes during a compact

metric.name: Compact Deletes
metric.description: Total number of times an oplog compact did a delete

metric.name: Compact Insert Time
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing inserts during a compact

metric.name: Compact Inserts
metric.description: Total number of times an oplog compact did a db insert

metric.name: Compact Time
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent compacting oplogs

metric.name: Compact Update Time
metric.description: Total amount of time, in nanoseconds, spent doing updates during a compact

metric.name: Compact Updates
metric.description: Total number of times an oplog compact did an update

metric.name: Compactable Op logs
metric.description: Current number of oplogs ready to be compacted

metric.name: Compacts
metric.description: Total number of completed oplog compacts

metric.name: Compacts In Progress
metric.description: current number of oplog compacts that are in progress

metric.name: Flushed Bytes
metric.description: The total number of bytes written to disk by async queue flushes.

metric.name: Flush Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent doing an async queue flush.

metric.name: Flushes
metric.description: The total number of times the an entry has been flushed from the async queue.

metric.name: Average Flush Time
metric.description: Average flush time.

metric.name: Flushes In Progress
metric.description: current number of oplog flushes that are in progress

metric.name: Inactive Oplogs
metric.description: Current number of oplogs that are no longer being written but are not ready ready to compact

metric.name: Open Oplogs
metric.description: Current number of open oplogs this region has

metric.name: Oplog Reads
metric.description: Total number of oplog reads

metric.name: Oplog Recovered Bytes
metric.description: The total number of bytes that have been read from oplogs during a recovery

metric.name: Oplog Recoveries
metric.description: The total number of oplogs recovered

metric.name: Oplog Recovery Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent doing an oplog recovery

metric.name: Oplog Seeks
metric.description: Total number of oplog seeks

metric.name: Queue Size
metric.description: The current number of entries in the async queue waiting to be flushed to disk

metric.name: Read Bytes
metric.description: The total number of bytes that have been read from disk

metric.name: Read Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent reading from disk

metric.name: Reads
metric.description: The total number of region entries that have been read from disk

metric.name: Average Read Time
metric.description: Average read time.

metric.name: Recovered Bytes
metric.description: The total number of bytes that have been read from disk during a recovery

metric.name: Recovered Entry Creates
metric.description: The total number of entry create records processed while recovering oplog data.

metric.name: Recovered Entry Destroys
metric.description: The total number of entry destroy records processed while recovering oplog data.

metric.name: Recovered Entry Updates
metric.description: The total number of entry update records processed while recovering oplog data.

metric.name: Recovered Values Skipped Due To LRU
metric.description: The total number of entry values that did not need to be recovered due to the LRU.

metric.name: Recoveries In Progress
metric.description: current number of persistent regions being recovered from disk

metric.name: Recovery Records Skipped
metric.description: The total number of oplog records skipped during recovery.

metric.name: Recovery Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent doing a recovery

metric.name: Remove Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent removing from disk

metric.name: Removes
metric.description: The total number of region entries that have been removed from disk

metric.name: Uncreated Recovered Regions
metric.description: The current number of regions that have been recovered but have not yet been created.

metric.name: Write Time
metric.description: The total amount of time spent writing to disk

metric.name: Writes
metric.description: The total number of region entries that have been written to disk. A write is done every time an entry is created on disk or every time its value is modified on disk.

metric.name: Average Write Time
metric.description: Average write time.

metric.name: Writes In Progress
metric.description: current number of oplog writes that are in progress

metric.name: Written Bytes
metric.description: The total number of bytes that have been written to disk
